content.title: üéâ BIG NEWS: Shipping Prices Significantly Reduced! üì¶üí•
content.creator:
Longer
March 15, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We are excited to share great news with you! Over the past weeks, we have been in continuous negotiations with our logistics partners, and as a result, shipping fees have been significantly reduced. This is especially beneficial for customers in Europe, the UK, Australia, New Zealand, and several other regions.
Please check the attached image for detailed shipping rates by country. Thank you for your continued support! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.
Thanks for your support,
LONGER

comments.text: I'm so excited to hear the UK shipping price is dramatically decreased by ¬£0,00 in update #7, and not to mention the looming threat of VAT.

UK price is same, if I have to pay VAT, $999 duo will cost me $1250. Last time I withdrew from nano pro 12w because it was not worth anymore due to taxation(VAT) of my already taxed money. Longer can really help UK customers by warehousing in UK to significantly reduce extra taxes/costs etc.

Hello Attawali! We are pleased to inform you that our optimized UK shipping rates already include customs duties, so you don't need to pay any additional customs duties. Thank you very much for your support!

That is a sigh of relief, great news. I'm really looking forward to all the amazing crafting possibilities with the duo. Now that you've mentioned that custom duties are included, I'm going to get a rotary attachment as well.
That's the update I've been waiting since Kickstarter launch. Finally, Canada costumers got a reasonable shipping rates. Now I can upgrade to the Premium Bundle!
Amazing. Thank you thank you. 170 is much better than $500!!
Great news.
Shipping Nano Duo to Europe is still at 49 as it was before. Don't see the benefit. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Would have liked to see more savings for the shipping costs in the US but ours were already lower than a lot of other regions, so good to see other areas are getting some additional savings
Great news and thanks

content.title: Shipping Cost Updated and New Shipping Options!
content.creator:
Longer
February 14, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We‚Äôre excited to share an important update regarding the shipping costs for the LONGER Nano Duo & Ruby, bundle packages, and accessories! Thanks to the ongoing efforts with our logistics partner, we‚Äôve managed to reduce shipping fees to most regions around the world. You can find the detailed shipping information in the image below.
Plus, we also offer sea freight shipping options for backers in Canada, Australia and New Zealand. 
The sea freight option comes with a flat rate for both individual units and bundles, and while it is more economical, it has a average 20 days longer delivery time.
Australia: Estimated delivery time of 45 days after shipment.
New Zealand: Estimated delivery time of 35 days after shipment.
Canada: Estimated delivery time of 38 days after shipment.
Sea Freight Shipping Fee
Updated International Express Shipping Fee

comments.text: The bundle shipping costs are still way too high for Canada. Unfortunately, I will have to rethink this purchase.

Hi Thiago Furtado, thank you for your feedback! We understand that shipping costs are higher in Canada. If you consider ocean shipping options, there may be a more cost-effective solution. We recommend that you look into the possibility of ocean shipping, which may reduce your shipping costs. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please feel free to let us know!

content.title: Longer Nano Duo & Ruby Shipping Cost Update
content.creator:
Longer
February 11, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,

You can find the detailed shipping information in this section. LONGER are committed to providing you with the highest value product and service! We‚Äôve worked closely with our logistics partner to reduce shipping costs and bring you the best possible discounts while ensuring fast and efficient delivery.

Thank you for the support and choosing LONGERÔºÅ

comments.text: I picked the Duo with a Rotary Ext. Will that ship as a bundle or will I need to pay shipping for each piece?

Hello Shane Hale, if you choose the bundle, it will be shipped as a combination, and the shipping cost is the shipping cost of the bundle. You do not need to pay the shipping cost for each component separately. Thank you for your support.
Will combined shipping be offered as extension almost the same cost to buy as ship.

Hello Ashley Howard, thank you very much for pointing this out. We will update the shipping costs for bundle packages in different regions. We will do our best to reduce shipping costs for you and other customers. Thank you again for your support of this project.

Hello Ashley Howard, thanks for your feedback! I understand your concerns about shipping costs. The weight and size of products do significantly influence the final price. There is a noticeable difference between bulk shipping to local warehouses and individual direct shipments. You can send the list of products you want to our customer service email: longercustomer@gmail.com. We will try our best to get a better price for you. Longer Service Team
Is there some shipping benefits when you ship the Nano together with some of the accesories?

Hello OnZo, thank you very much for pointing this out. We will update the shipping costs for bundle packages in different regions. We will do our best to reduce shipping costs for you and other customers. Thank you again for your support of this project.

Hello OnZo, thanks for your feedback! I understand your concerns about shipping costs. The weight and size of products do significantly influence the final price. There is a noticeable difference between bulk shipping to local warehouses and individual direct shipments. You can send the list of products you want to our customer service email: longercustomer@gmail.com. We will try our best to get a better price for you. Longer Service Team
